item.title: CentOS 8.3 upgrade default nginx
item.description: Add the repo of University of Science and Technology of China vim /etc/yum.repos.d/nginx.repo Add the contents to the file： [nginx-mainline] name=nginx mainline repo baseurl=http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/nginx/mainline/centos/$releasever/$basearch/ gpgcheck=0 enabled=1 module_hotfixes=true Update the nginx yum update nginx Check the version of the nginx nginx -v
